name: Luxe Highlighter Duo
about: What it is: A transformative, high-gloss hybrid highlighter with a silky, skin-hugging texture and rich, lasting color with pure pearl impact...Finish: Radiant..Formulation: Cream..Highlighted Ingredients:.- Squalane and Sodium Hyaluronate: Hydrate and visibly plump skin...Ingredient Callouts: Free of parabens and mineral oil. It is also vegan and cruelty-free...What Else You Need to Know: Formulated with a clear base for optimal color clarity and translucent payoff, this weightless highlighter blends and layers seamlessly. Its color adheres to skin, attracting light to your facial features.
ingredients: -Squalane and Sodium Hyaluronate: Hydrate and visibly plump skin...Mica, Octyldodecyl Stearoyl Stearate, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Isostearyl Alcohol, Isodecyl Neopentanoate, Silica, Nylon-12, Persea Gratissima (Avocado) Oil, Magnesium Stearate, Lauroyl Lysine, Tin Oxide, Sodium Hyaluronate, Potassium Sorbate, Phenoxyethanol. May Contain/Peut Contenir (u00b1): Ci 77891 (Titanium Dioxide), Ci 77491, Ci 77492, Ci 77499 (Iron Oxides), Ci 77742 (Manganese Violet).
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Apply powder to a soft, ufb02uffy brush, tapping off any excess..-Sweep onto cheekbones, brow bone, Cupidu2019s bow, and wherever else youu2019d like to add glow..-Build to desired intensity.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This bronzer is magic!!! The colors are rich and beautiful, and the powder feels like silk. I'm a novice when it comes to bronzer cuz I'm afraid of looking like a disco ball, but let me tell you, this right here gives just the right amount of shimmer. Makes me feel like a bronze goddess!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: First of all, I like the packaging of this product and I think it feels very expensive. The product itself is very beautiful and glowy, I think itu2019s very pigmented  and applies easy on the face and body. -Gifted by Fashion Fair Cosmetics

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Wow! We are talking PIGMENT ladies and gents! This is definitely not a highlight on my skin tone. But I already knew I would be using this as blush when I picked it out. It says in the description that it is a cream formula, but it doesnu2019t feel like it to me when I swatch it. But regardless, this is STUNNING. The texture is SMOOOOOOTH!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a subtle pretty highlight. I have been wearing fashion fair since I was 14 and I was so happy to see the brand coming back. I love highlight! Sometimes I like a natural highlight and sometimes I like a bold highlight. This is a light highlight. It makes you look glowy. The color is so pretty. I love gold highlight! I had to layer it cause I wanted it to pop more! I would order this again!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this complimentary from Luxe. The highlighter duo is absolutely beautiful from its packaging all the way to the actual product. I like subtle highlights and this gave me that. The product does seem buildable for those that prefer more of a pop.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product is fantastic! its a duo set in one. I loved the color; it was so pigmented, which looks great on my skin type. It gives a natural glow to the skin, and it's a must-have. I highly suggest it to all!
